hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) was asked about the offspring of the pagans. He said, "Allah knows what they would have done (were they to live)

chapter.ara-name: باب اللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا كَانُوا عَامِلِينَ
chapter.eng-name: It is Allah Who knows what they would have done
